data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Tungurahua, Ecuador to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tungurahua, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Tungurahua to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 61,464 believers in Tungurahua to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 483,276 people in the state of Tungurahua who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, help the 61,464 believers in Tungurahua to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 519,936 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Tungurahua.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tungurahua.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

location.name: Tungurahua
location.people_groups_list: Chachi, Achuar Jivaro, Secoya, Tsachila, Waorani
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chachi (11,000), Achuar Jivaro (7,100), Secoya (500), Tsachila (3,200), Waorani (2,600)
